name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description:
The following are the frames for the skills that you 
want to display above the combat skills when you open the menu.
name: -----　Spare

description:
The following are prerequisite skills that are mainly 
used by enemies.
name: -----　Enemy

description: Performs a series of attacks against a single enemy.
name: Dual Attack

description: Attacks twice against a single random enemy.
name: Double Attack

description: Performs 3 attacks against a single random enemy.
name: Triple Attack

description: The user leaves the battle.
name: Escape

description: Just watching.
name: Wait

description: Absorbs the HP of a single enemy.
name: Bloodsucking

description: Restores the user's HP.
name: Meditation

description: A poison needle sticks into a single enemy, paralyzing it.
name: Electric needle

description:
Damages a single enemy and causes them to lose their 
balance.
name: Body blow

description:
Deals lightning damage to a single enemy and paralyzes 
them.
name: Electric shock

description:
Causes mucus to adhere to a single enemy, reducing 
their agility.
name: Mucus

description:
Spews a poisonous liquid at a single enemy, putting 
them in a poisoned state.
name: Venom

description:
It inspires the user's fighting spirit and strengthens 
their abilities.
name: Roar

description: Absorbs MP of a single enemy.
name: Strange Dance

description: Stares at a single enemy and paralyzes it.
name: Paralyzing Stare

description: Makes a single enemy blind.
name: Blind

description: Makes a single enemy blind.
name: Cloud of sand

description: Makes a single enemy blind.
name: Flash

description: Poisons the entire enemy.
name: Poisonous fog

description: Causes the entire enemy to fall asleep.
name: Lullaby

description: Enchants the entire enemy.
name: Seduction Song

description: Seals the magic of all enemies.
name: Silence Song

description: Causes confusion to all enemies.
name: Ultrasonic

description: Deals earth damage to all enemies.
name: Throwing stone

description: Deals wind damage to all enemies.
name: Dust Devil

description: Inflicts fire damage to all enemies.
name: Fire Breath

description: Deals ice damage to all enemies.
name: Ice Breath

description: Deals earth damage to all enemies.
name: Earthquake

description: Deals water damage to all enemies.
name: Tsunami

description: Deals damage to a single enemy.
name: Claw

description:
The following are the frames for the skills that you 
want to display above the combat skills when you open the menu.
name: -----　Spare

description:
The following are prerequisite magic skills that are 
primarily used by the player.
name: -----　Basic Magic

description: Restores HP to a single ally.
name: Heal I

description: Restores HP to a single ally.
name: Heel II

description: Restores HP to a single ally.
name: Heel III

description: Restores the HP of all allies.
name: Recover I

description: Restores the HP of all allies.
name: Recover II

description: Restores the HP of all allies.
name: Recover III

description: Heals poison, paralysis, and sleep of a single ally.
name: Cure I

description:
Heals a single ally of any condition other than 
disabling.
name: Cure II

description: Heals all allies except those who are unable to fight.
name: Cure III

description: Resurrects a single ally from battle damage.
name: Resurrect I

description:
Resurrects a single ally from battle damage and 
restores a large amount of HP.
name: Resurrect II

description:
The following are the frames for the skills that you 
want to display above the combat skills when you open the menu.
name: -----　Spare

description: Poisons the entire enemy.
name: Poison

description: Blinds the entire enemy.
name: Blind

description: Confuses the entire enemy.
name: Confuse

description: Seals the magic of all enemies.
name: Silence

description: Causes the entire enemy to fall asleep.
name: Sleep

description: Paralyzes the entire enemy.
name: Paralyze

description:
The following are the frames for the skills that you 
want to display above the combat skills when you open the menu.
name: -----　Spare

description:
Increases the attack power of a single ally.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Weapon Breath

description:
Reduces the attack power of all enemies.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Weapon Curse

description:
Increases the defense of a single ally.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Armor breath

description:
Reduces the defense of all enemies.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Armor Curse

description:
Increases the magic power of a single ally.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Spirit Breath

description:
Reduces the magic power of all enemies.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Sprit Curse

description:
Increases the magic defense of a single ally.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Divine Breath

description:
Reduces the magic defense of all enemies.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Divine Curse

description:
Increases the agility of a single ally.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Quick Move

description:
Reduces the agility of all enemies.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Slow Move

description: Absorbs the HP of a single enemy.
name: Life Drain

description: Absorbs MP of a single enemy.
name: Mana Drain

name: Thunder III

name: Spark II

name: Spark III

name: Water II

name: Shade II

description: Inflicts defense-neutral damage to a single enemy.
name: Burst I

Inflicts damage to all enemies while ignoring their 
defenses.
name: Nuclear I

Inflicts damage to all enemies while ignoring their

description:
The following are the frames for the skills that you 
want to display above the combat skills when you open the menu.
name: -----　Spare

description:
The following are prerequisite skills that are 
primarily used by warrior.
name: -----　Warrior Skills

description: A powerful attack against a single enemy.
name: Strong Attack

description: Attack against all enemies.
name: Cleave

description: Performs two attacks against a single enemy.
name: Continuous attack

description:
Inspires the user's fighting spirit and increases attack power.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Spirit

description: Restores HP to a single ally.
name: Emergency measure

description: A super-powerful attack against a single enemy.
name: Maiden's Posture

description: Perform a strong attack against all enemies.
name: Spin Crash

description:
The following are prerequisite skills that are 
primarily used by wizards.
name: ----- Priest and wizard skills

description:
Increases the defense and magic defense of all allies.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Magic Barrier

description: Increases the user's magic power significantly for 5 turns.
name: Spell Enhance

description:
Inspires the fighting spirit of all allies and increases their attack power.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Ale

description: Inflicts damage to all enemies while ignoring their defenses.
name: Meteor

description: Gives a flame attribute for 5 turns.
name: Fire Weapon

description: Gives an ice attribute for 5 turns.
name: Ice Weapon

description: Gives lightning attribute for 5 turns.
name: Thunder Weapon

description: Reflects attack magic directed at the user for 5 turns.
name: Magic Mirror

description:
The following is a list of prerequisite skills that are
primarily used by knights.
name: ----- Knightly Skills

description: Automatically protects an ally with low HP for one turn.
name: Protect

description: Attack a single enemy before anyone else.
name: Falconer

description: Performs two attacks against a single enemy.
name: Two-Stage Thrusting

description: An attack that ignores defense against a single enemy.
name: Armor Piercing

description:
Inspires the fighting spirit of all allies and increases their attack power.
Can be stacked up to two times.
name: Blackmail

description: Attack against all enemies.
name: Windmill

description: Increase the user's TP slightly.
name: Cleaning Mind

description: Randomly attacks four enemies four times.
name: Disturbance Thrust

description:
The following are prerequisite skills that are 
primarily used by thieves.
name: ----- Thievery Skills

description: Makes a single enemy blind.
name: Blind

description: Greatly increases the user's agility.
name: Warming Up

description: Blinds the entire enemy.
name: Flashbang

description: Increase the drop rate of items.
name: Look for a Chance

description: Deals damage to all enemies.
name: Calling Wind

description: Make it harder to become a target.
name: Hide

description: The following are prerequisite skills that are primarily used by fighters.
name: ----- Fighter's Skills

description:
It damages the entire enemy and makes them lose their 
balance.
name: Tripping Up

description: Treats the weakening of the user.
name: Stoma

description: Deals powerful damage to all enemies.
name: Turning Kick

description:
Deals powerful damage to a single enemy that ignores 
defense.
name: Raging Tiger Ranbu

description:
The following are prerequisite skills that are 
primarily used by hunters.
name: ----- Hunter-Type Skills

description: Reduces the attack and defense power of a single enemy.
name: Point Shot

description:
It strikes the entire enemy in the feet and makes them 
lose their balance.
name: Stun Shot

description: Deals 5 damage to a single enemy.
name: Team Shot

description: Deals 2 damage to the entire enemy.
name: Rainshot.
